SEARCH
Module view.bookscrabble
Package view.data

Class GameModelReceiver

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
view.data.GameModelReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameModelReceiver extends Observable implements Serializable
The GameModelReceiver class is responsible for receiving and updating the game model from the server. It listens for model updates from the server and notifies observers when a new model is received.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModelReceiver

      public GameModelReceiver(String ip, int port)
      Constructs a new GameModelReceiver object with the specified IP address and port number. It establishes a connection to the server and initializes the input stream.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the server.
      port - The port number of the server.
